about_the_game:
Introducing Incubus Express!
Incubus Express is a Third-Person Adult Fantasy Platformer being lovingly crafted by our team here at Studio Jigli. Made by adults for adults we aim to give a game experience that has narrative, love interests and platform fun.

Join Incuboi in growing his shop Incubus Express! Get pulled into the various plots happening around Blooming Oasis while you collect, gather, and craft gifts for your clients and friends. Tiamat your lovely Wyvern friend and assistant will help you in more ways than one.

Game Features
  • Fantasy Storyline
  • Full 3D Animated Sex Scenes
  • 3D Platforming and Related Mechanics
  • Dialogue System
  • Quest System
  • Outfits
  • Lover's Hub
  • Crafting & Gifts

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains adult content including nudity, sexual dialogue, sexual scenes and scenarios. Stylized nudity and sex.

name: Incubus Express

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8, 8.1, and Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel (4th gen) or AMD (FX-4170) processor or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760 or better
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Quad-core (7th gen) Intel or AMD (Ryzen 1st gen) processor or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 or better
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated / dedicated sound card

short_description: Welcome to Blooming Oasis, where the days are hot and the nights are hotter! You play as Incuboi owner of Incubus Express a craft shop dedicated to making adult toys for various monster girls. Trouble isn't far away as you get dragged into the various plots, and love triangles happening around you.
